name: UpDog (ACCGameDevClub)
description:
Finding yourself in a deep ditch with rising water and a weird gang of archers, you must use your powerful farts to jump your way home! 

Press "A" for left movement, "D" for right movement, and Space for fart/double fart. 

Amit Hossain: Organization, Design
Marcy Nabors: Organization, Programming
Jake Sullivan: Programming
McKennah Diver: Design, Testing
Caesar Villegas: Art
Grant Johnson: Music & Sound Effects
Andy Naranjos: Design
Morgan Evans: Storyboards
Draca Baugh-Flowers: Moral Support

Special Thanks: Sara Farr, Tim Prata, Austin Community College
